description: This file defines the BirthdayRepository class, which provides an abstraction layer for accessing birthday data through Firebase APIs, including methods for CRUD operations and subscription to real-time updates.

classes.name: BirthdayRepository
classes.description: Provides data access methods for birthday entities, interfacing with Firebase APIs for CRUD operations and real-time subscriptions.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of birthdays for the specified user.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a birthday record by its ID.

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to real-time updates of birthdays for a user.
